author: Marcus Muehlbauer
comment: Only thing that could be changed are the hands. They are not detailed and glossy enough. That seems to be the case for most watch faces independent of the developer. Overall great concept and more cities would likely lead to more revenue. Thanks for putting this one up for free.
title: Great concept

author: Sid D
comment: Love the classic feel.. Parisian theme only makes it better.. Roman numerals perfect for that vintage look.. The hands cud've been glossier.. But overall I'd definitely recommend
title: Like it

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Broken on the Huawei watch. Doesn't line up with the face.

author: Luis Mendoza
comment: Face does not center on moto 360
It was totally off centre? Couldn't look at it
